title: Pointdev Ideal Administration 2008 v8.45
description:
Info:
IDEAL Administration simplifies the administration of your Windows NT, XP, 2000 and 2003 network by providing in a single tool all the necessary features for managing domains, servers, and users.

Your administration can be done through a local network, via a Wan, a VPN, or Internet.

General description of the software:

    * Centralized administration of NT, 2000 and 2003 domains
          o User and group management
          o Service, registry and event management
          o and much more...
    * Simple, fast and secure remote control of the servers and stations
          o Remote installation and configuration
          o Computer group settings
    * Remote software deployment and execution in the network
          o Remote installation and execution
          o msi, bat and exe management
          o Powerful filtering
          o Clear and detailed
    * Database inventory of servers and client stations
          o OU, Computers, Users and Groups
          o Files and directories
          o Registry, rights, printers and shares
          o Network configuration
          o Software, drives, hotfixes and system information
          o Database exporter for scheduling inventories
    * Full object migration between domains or servers
          o User accounts migration including password
          o File server migration and consolidation
          o User group migration
          o Share folder migration
    * Optimizes and secures servers and stations
          o optimizes, secures and configures Windows NT, 2000, 2003, XP and Vista operating systems in a few clicks and without agents.
    * Exchange 5.5, 2000 and 2003 management
          o Mailbox creation, deletion and management
    * Server monitoring
          o File and session recording throughout the network
          o Daily logging in CSV files



**PLEASE NOTE**  VIRUS TOTAL REPORTS STRANGE BEHAVIOUR IN THE KEYGEN. SANDBOXIE SHOWS NO SUCH BEHAVIOUR. A LIST OF SERIALS IS INCLUDED WITH THIS DOWNLOAD.
